PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10802024-10-11PMO
ActDepartment of Public Safety and Emergency Prepareness Act
PrecisAppointment of TRICIA GEDDES of Ottawa, Ontario, to be Deputy Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to be styled Deputy Minister of Public Safety, to hold office during pleasure, effective October 31, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
